news.title: Poll code casts shadow on property registrations in Telangana
news.para: Senior officials said that a majority of real estate developers, property buyers and those looking for investments will wait till the polls are over.

news.title: ED raids on sand quarries affect supply, prices; shortage hits construction sector
news.para: ED officials have been visiting sand quarry sites across the state to investigate if sand excavated from river beds is being sold illegally, causing a huge loss to the government.

news.title: NGT directs UP to file response on plea questioning exemption from environmental clearance to brick kilns
news.para: This circular was questioned on the grounds of not being compliant with the Supreme Court's directions mandating Environment Impact Assessment clearance from the Union Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change.

news.title: Himachal Pradesh plans to make building foundation checks a must
news.para: For high-risk buildings, especially residential, commercial, industrial, real estate and institutional projects, the geological investigation report as well as the detailed structural design report as per BIS codes is being made mandatory at the time of approval.

news.title: Unsystematic disposal of construction debris by builders irks Nashik civic chief
news.para: During a meeting with the civic body’s Godavari pollution prevention cell, Karanjkar told civic officials to start acting against erring builders and private parties found disposing waste in a haphazard manner.

news.title: KPMG hit with $26 million fine for 'textbook failure' in Carillion audits
news.para: The collapse of Carillion, a major government contractor building hospitals and other infrastructure, in January 2018, along with the collapse of retailer BHS two years earlier, led to three government-backed reviews of auditing markets and standards.

news.title: Mumbai: About 4,700 government employees in Bandra quarters to get ownership flats
news.para: On Wednesday, Shinde had presided over a meeting to discuss the redevelopment of the government colony. At the meeting, Shinde had directed officials to ascertain the development potential of the slum area and submit a detailed redevelopment plan.

news.title: Mumbai: Borivli CHS, developer sent to arbitrator over transit rent dispute
news.para: Om Satyam Niwas CHS, a society in Borivli (West) with 26 flat owners and eight shop owners, went to court last year invoking the arbitration clause in the redevelopment agreement.

news.title: Litigants can't hijack court cases: Bombay HC; Rs 2 lakh cost imposed on Modern Realty
news.para: The Bombay HC also imposed a cost of Rs 2 lakh on Modern Realty Pvt Ltd to be paid to KEM Hospital and Medical College within a month.

news.title: Bank of Maharashtra hikes lending rate by 10 bps
news.para: ​The benchmark one-year MCLR, used to price most consumer loans such as auto, personal and home, has been revised upwards to 8.60 per cent from 8.70 per cent, the lender said in a regulatory filing.

news.title: Bombay HC refuses bail to Radius Group MD in Yes Bank money laundering case
news.para: ​​The ED's case is that Chhabriaa had played a crucial role in diverting funds procured illegally by Yes Bank's founder Rana Kapoor and DHFL promoter Kapil Wadhwan. Justice Karnik said further investigation was on with regard to the larger offence of money laundering in the case.

news.title: Rs 47 lakh crore required to decarbonise India's steel, cement plants, finds new study
news.para: The study, the first-of-its-kind calculation of the cost of decarbonising these industries, also pointed out these two sectors will need Rs 1 lakh crore each year in additional operational expenditure (OPEX) to achieve net zero.

news.title: Mahindra Lifespaces acquires 5.38 acres land parcel in Pune
news.para: This land has saleable area potential of approximately 1.5 million sq ft for residential development, Mahindra Lifespaces said in a regulatory filing.

news.title: Signature Global reports 113.92% growth in pre-sales at Rs 879.78 crore in Q1 FY24
news.para: Signature Global reported 64.92% growth in collections at Rs 1,327.45 crore in H1 FY24 while its sales realization grew to approximately Rs 9,800 per sq. ft. from about Rs 7,425 per sq. ft. in H1 FY23.

news.title: Shalimar Paints looks to invest Rs 200 crore in two years
news.para: “We are being very, very careful with where we spend. So within this Rs 200 crore, we have already drawn out the plan, most of the ordering also has been done and execution has started,” said Ashok Gupta, MD & CEO, Shalimar Paints.

news.title: New office space supply across top seven cities to exceed 165 million sq ft between 2023-2025: Report
news.para: Between 2023-2025, Bengaluru will lead the office space supply, accounting for 29% of the total supply in India, followed by Hyderabad at 20%, Delhi-NCR at 17%, Pune at 12%, Chennai at 11%, Mumbai at 9% and Kolkata at 2%.

news.title: Push for planned construction: Himachal Pradesh chief secretary
news.para: To save precious human lives, compliance of the rules of the Urban and Town Planning Act would be ensured and planned construction works would be promoted, he added.

news.title: YEIDA announces group housing plot scheme for Greater Noida
news.para: There will be an allocation of land for a total of six types of plots in Sector 22-D of Greater Noida, and bidding worth crores for this will take place on November 21.

news.title: Bokaro Steel Plant to raze over 100 houses on October 12
news.para: This locality is the same where recently squatters launched an attack on the BSL anti-encroachment team when it went to remove a concrete structure coming up illegally close to the Sector 4 police station.
